body.p: We’re continuously improving security in Couchbase. Starting with 4.5 Developer Preview we’re introducing X.509 Certificates for TLS between client-to-server and cross-datacenter (XDCR) communications. This provides a strongly trusted channel for encrypting sensitive data on the wire.

We believe that we are making important improvements to the product security, and understand that changes like these might trigger a lot of questions. If you want to provide feedback, you can file an issue directly in our issue tracking system ticket or use the Couchbase discussion forums.
